description: Bat-Fam is an upcoming animated web series that is set to land on digital screens soon. The show will follow the iconic hero of Batman and his family, fighting demons and villains, while leading their lives in a mansion.
title: Bat-Fam OTT Release Date Revealed: Know Everything About This Upcoming Animated Series Online

description: Astronomers from Yonsei University and DESI data analyses indicate dark energy, long believed constant, may be weakening. Corrected supernova results hint that cosmic acceleration is slowing—a possible “cosmic slowdown.” If true, this could help resolve the Hubble tension and redefine how the universe’s expansion and ultimate fate are understood.
title: Is the Universe Slowing Down? Astronomers Detect Signs of Fading Dark Energy

description: Mithra Mandali, a relatable comedy based on a group of very charming yet directionless friends who meet a politician’s daughter and their lives are altered, which leads to many comical events, is now streaming on Amazon Prime Video in Telugu.
title: Mithra Mandali Now Available for Streaming on Amazon Prime Video: What You Need to Know

description: Interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS defied expectations during its 2025 solar flyby, brightening far faster than predicted. Observatories worldwide recorded a blue coma rich in exotic gases, suggesting unique chemistry from another star system. Scientists are investigating whether its unusual composition or speed caused the outburst, marking a new interstellar mystery.
title: Mystery Deepens as Interstellar Comet 3I/ATLAS Brightens Unexpectedly Near the Sun

description: Researchers have created a new fiber that surpasses Kevlar in bullet-stopping power while being much thinner. Made by aligning advanced aramid chains with carbon nanotubes, the material absorbs over twice as much energy as previous record-holding fibers. The breakthrough could lead to lighter, stronger armor for military, law enforcement and personal safety uses.
title: Scientists Create Bullet-Proof Fiber Stronger and Thinner Than Kevlar

description: A Matt Shackman directorial, The Fantastic Four: First Steps, where the Fantastic Four try to balance their bond and duty towards the Earth, is Now Streaming on Jio Hotstar.
title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps Now Streaming on JioHotstar: Everything You Need to Know

description: The Kardashians return with Season 7, now streaming on JioHotstar. Kim, Kourtney, Khloé, Kendall, Kylie, and Kris Jenner navigate new challenges, emotional stories, and personal milestones in this latest season. With drama, humor, and glitz, the reality show promises to deliver everything fans adore about the famous family. IMDb rating: 4.5/10
title: The Kardashians Season 7 Now Streaming on JioHotstar: Everything You Need to Know About the Glamorous Reality Series

description: Jennifer Garner headlines The Last Thing He Told Me, a suspenseful Apple TV series based on Laura Dave’s novel. Premiering on February 20, 2025, it follows a woman’s desperate search for her missing husband and the haunting secrets that threaten her family. With gripping performances and emotional depth, this Reese Witherspoon-produced drama has earned a strong audience response and solid critical ratings.
title: The Last Thing He Told Me: Jennifer Garner’s Emotional Mystery Series Returns on Apple TV

description: The Bank of England has pledged to introduce its stablecoin regulatory framework at the same pace as the United States. Deputy Governor Sarah Breeden said the plan aims to balance innovation and consumer protection. At the same time, the Financial Conduct Authority has ended its four-year ban on crypto ETNs, marking another major step in the UK’s evolving approach to digital-asset oversight.
title: Bank of England Plans to Match US Pace on Stablecoin Regulation: Report

description: The best camera smartphones under Rs. 40,000 in India include the Oppo F31 Pro+, OnePlus 13R, Vivo V60, Vivo T4 Ultra, Realme GT 7, iQOO Neo 10, and Samsung Galaxy A56 5G. These models offer flagship-grade imaging with 50-megapixel primary cameras, AI-driven enhancements, and advanced video recording. Powered by Snapdragon and Dimensity chipsets, they combine strong performance with excellent photography and fast charging. Each device also features premium AMOLED displays, large batteries, and durable, water-resistant designs.
title: Best Camera Smartphones Under Rs 40,000: Galaxy A56 5G, OnePlus 13R, Realme GT 7 and More

description: Canon EOS R6 Mark III has been launched in India with a price tag of Rs. 2,43,995 for the camera body. It comes with a 32.5-megapixel full-frame CMOS sensor with an ISO speed ranging from 50 to 1,02,400. The mirrorless camera offers12fps with a mechanical shutter and 40fps shooting speed with an electronic shutter.  It runs on the Digic X processor and offers up to 7K video recording. It has Dual Pixel CMOS AF II.
title: Canon EOS R6 Mark III Mirrorless Camera With 32.5-Megapixel Sensor Launched in India: Price, Features

description: The UPI 123Pay service introduced by the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) allows users with feature phones to do UPI transactions. This can be done by dialling the number 080 4516 3666 from your feature phone. Your mobile number must be linked to your bank account to avail this service. Users can make UPI payments using sound-based technology and built-in apps.
title: How to Make UPI Payments Using a Simple Feature Phone: A Step-by-Step Guide

description: Indian developer Tathvamasi Studio has revealed the gameplay trailer for its upcoming rhythm action platformer, Suri: The Seventh Note. The game is set to launch on PS5 and PC in 2026. Suri: The Seventh Note is now also available to wishlist on PlayStation Store and Steam.
title: Indian Rhythm Action Game Suri: The Seventh Note Gets Gameplay Trailer; Launch Set for 2026

description: India’s telecom operators offer several entry-level postpaid plans aimed at value seekers. Airtel’s Rs. 449 plan provides 50GB data with rollover and bundled entertainment and cloud benefits. Jio’s Rs. 349 plan offers 30GB data and streaming perks, with additional student benefits for those aged 18 to 25. Vi’s Rs. 451 plan includes 50GB data and a wider list of bundled services, but at a higher monthly cost.
title: Jio vs Airtel vs Vi: Cheapest Postpaid Plans Compared

description: India has released its AI Governance Framework, outlining a risk-based approach to regulating artificial intelligence. The 68-page guidelines focus on human rights, safety, transparency, and fairness while encouraging early internal safeguards for developers. The report proposes new oversight bodies, sector-specific regulation for high-risk uses, mandatory rules over time, and national monitoring of real-world harms. It also prioritises AI infrastructure and locally relevant datasets.
title: MeitY Unveils India AI Governance Framework with Key Principles and Roadmap

description: Miami Mayor Francis Suárez revealed in a Fox Business interview that his Bitcoin salary has grown by about 300 percent since 2021. The mayor, a long-time crypto supporter, said he remains confident in Bitcoin’s long-term potential despite its price swings. Under his leadership, Miami has pursued several blockchain initiatives, including the city’s native token, MiamiCoin.
title: Miami Mayor Francis Suárez Says His Bitcoin Salary Has Tripled in Value

description: iPhone Air was launched globally in September as Apple's new thin and light smartphone. The handset boasts a thickness of 5.6mm while featuring a Titanium frame. However, the Cupertino tech giant could have started developing the supposed successor to the iPhone Air, which could be called iPhone Air 2. A tipster has shared a render and key specifications of the rumoured smartphone, suggesting it might carry a dual rear camera unit. If true, it would be a significant improvement over its predecessor.
title: iPhone Air 2 Spotted in Leaked Design Render That Hints at Dual Rear Camera Setup

description: WhatsApp has confirmed that its upcoming Usernames feature will be available to people next year as an optional functionality. The announcement was made via an email sent to WhatsApp business accounts, asking them to adjust their workflows and update their connected systems to prepare for the imminent change. Soon, users will be able to adopt a username, allowing them to hide their phone numbers in individual conversations and group chats.
title: WhatsApp Username Feature Said to Roll Out in 2026, Business Accounts Could Also Get Access

description: Google Pixel Watch 4 is now available for purchase in India. The wearable, which was launched in the country in August, can be purchased through Google India's online store and Flipkart. It is available in two sizes and multiple colour options. It runs on a Snapdragon W5 Gen 2 processor and a Cortex-M55 co-processor.
title: Google Pixel Watch 4 Goes on Sale in India: Price, Specifications, Sale Offers

description: The Oppo Reno 14 5G Diwali Edition features a premium design and boasts a sleek profile. The handset packs a vivid 6.59-inch 1.5K flat AMOLED display with good viewing angles. The handset also comes loaded with a MediaTek Dimensity 8350 processor capable of delivering good performance. The phone also packs a triple-camera setup that offers good results in different lighting conditions. The device also features a large 6,000mAh battery and comes loaded with 80W fast charging support, which can fully charge the device in under one hour.
title: Oppo Reno14 5G Diwali Edition Changes Colour With Heat: Gimmick or the Future of Design?

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra may not see major camera upgrades despite the powerful Exynos 2600 chipset. Leaks suggest the phone will retain most of its predecessor’s sensors, with only the 3x telephoto camera upgraded from 10-megapixel sensor to a 12-megapixel one. While the Exynos 2600 reportedly supports advanced imaging and 8K video, Samsung may reserve its full capabilities for future models. The Galaxy S26 Ultra is also expected to feature faster 55W PPS charging, improving efficiency over the previous 45W system.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra Camera, Charging Specifications Leaked Alongside Exynos 2600 Details

description: Tinder is testing “Chemistry,” an AI feature that scans users’ camera rolls, after permission, to suggest a small number of more relevant matches each day and reduce swipe fatigue. Positioned as a major part of Tinder’s 2026 product strategy, the tool is live in Australia and New Zealand. However, its approach raises privacy concerns about how sensitive photos may be accessed, processed or stored.
title: Tinder Wants to See Through Your Camera Roll to Suggest Potential Matches

description: Amazon has issued a cease-and-desist notice to Perplexity, alleging its Comet AI browser disguises itself as Chrome to bypass safeguards and access the Amazon Store on users’ behalf, creating security and trust risks. Perplexity rejected the claims, accusing Amazon of blocking innovation. The dispute highlights growing tension between major platforms and AI agents that automate browsing and transactions.
title: Amazon vs Perplexity: 5 Things to Know About the Agentic AI Browser War

description: Lenskart announced on Thursday that it is planning to launch its next-generation B by Lenskart smartglasses in India by the end of this year. Moreover, the company will soon allow developers in the country to start creating apps for the wearable. Lenskart has also revealed some specifications of the soon-to-be-launched AI smartglasses. B by Lenskart will be powered by a Snapdragon AR1 Gen 1 chipset. It will also allow wearers to make hand-free UPI payments.
title: B by Lenskart AI Smart Glasses to Be Available to Developers in India; Could Launch By December

description: Gemini Space Station is planning to expand beyond crypto trading by launching regulated prediction market contracts. The exchange, which went public in September, is reportedly seeking CFTC approval to offer users the ability to trade outcomes of real-world events such as elections and economic data.
title: Gemini Crypto Exchange Aims to Launch Regulated Prediction Market Contracts

description: Nvidia has joined Indian and US investors in supporting deep-tech startups in India, with over $850 million in new commitments. The initiative, launched in September with $1 billion, targets sectors like AI, robotics, semiconductors, and space. As a founding member and advisor, Nvidia will offer technical guidance, training, and policy support to help startups adopt its AI tools.
title: Nvidia Joins India Deep Tech Alliance as Group Adds New Members, $850 Million Pledge

description: Tata Play has partnered with Apple Music to offer subscribers free access to the streaming service across its Binge, Mobile, and Fiber platforms. New users can enjoy four months of complimentary access, while returning users receive three months before the standard Rs. 119 monthly rate begins. The offer, available to all DTH, OTT, and broadband customers, can be redeemed via a promo code. The collaboration expands Tata Play’s entertainment portfolio, bringing music streaming into its growing ecosystem.
title: Apple Music Now Available to Tata Play Subscribers With Up to Four Months of Free Access

description: Meta, through a press release on Thursday, announced that Ray-Ban Meta Glasses are set to launch on November 21 on Amazon, Flipkart, and the Reliance Digital website. The smart glasses were launched in India in May with a starting price tag of Rs. 29,900. They were available for purchase exclusively through Ray-Ban.com and select leading retail stores. The smart glasses have a 12-megapixel camera, open-ear speakers, and built-in microphones.
title: Ray-Ban Meta Glasses Gen 1 to Be Available via Amazon, Flipkart and More From November 21

description: Huawei Mate 70 Air has been launched in China with a 6,500mAh battery and two chipset options. The phone is currently available for pre-order via the company's only store in four storage configurations and three colourways. The new Huawei handset supports 66W wired fast charging. It gets a quad rear camera setup, headlined by a 50-megapixel primary shooter. On the front, it boasts a 10.7-inch selfie camera. The smartphone sports a 7-inch AMOLED display, too.
title: Huawei Mate 70 Air Launched With 6,500mAh Battery, 6.6mm Slim Form Factor: Price, Specifications

description: Realme GT 8 Pro India launch date has been confirmed via the phone's dedicated microsite. The handset will arrive in India in the third week of November. It is confirmed to be sold in the country via the smartphone maker's online store and Flipkart. The upcoming flagship will be powered by Qualcomm's 3nm octa core Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. It will also carry a Ricoh GR-powered triple rear camera setup and an LED flash. This comes nearly a month after its debut in China on October 21.
title: Realme GT 8 Pro India Launch Date Confirmed; Set to Debut on Same Day as Lava Agni 4

description: The OTT platforms are set to buzz your screens with high action, thrillers, drama, movies, and series for the week. Top releases include Maharani Season 4, Baramulla, and more.
title: Top OTT Releases of the Week (Nov 3 - Nov 9): Baramulla, Maharani Season 4, Bad Girl, The Fantastic Four: First Steps, Mirai Hindi, and More

description: Airtel's Gopal Vittal has announced that India's second-largest telecom service provider (TSP) has begun the transition process from 5G to 5G Advanced network in the country. As part of its plan, the company has started deploying the dual-mode 5G network in select circles, which uses the Non-Standalone (NSA) + Standalone (SA) model, as a test pilot. The company plans to commercially roll out 5G Advanced network in the coming months.
title: Airtel Begins Transition to Dual 5G Network in India as Telco Prepares 5G Advanced Rollout

description: Bitcoin traded around $103,400 (roughly Rs. 91.6 lakh) on Thursday as the crypto market attempted to stabilise following steep losses earlier in the week. Most altcoins, including Solana, BNB, and Dogecoin, continued to decline. Analysts said macro uncertainty and ETF outflows are keeping investor sentiment fragile, although upcoming US jobless data and crypto bill discussions could provide short-term catalysts for Bitcoin’s next direction.
title: Bitcoin Rises to $103,400 After Sharp Selloff; Altcoins Extend Losses Across Broader Market

description: Walt Disney and Epic Games are bringing Disneyland to Fortnite. The free-to-play Battle Royale game will get a limited-time Disneyland Game Rush island on November 6, featuring a collection of minigames based on Disney theme park rides. The game mode will not feature Battle Royale and instead focus on Disney minigames.
title: Fortnite Is Adding a Limited-Time Disneyland Island Featuring Minigames Based on Disney Theme Park Rides

description: Nintendo has launched the Nintendo Store app for iPhone, iPad, and Android, expanding its eShop access beyond Japan for the first time. The app lets users browse and buy Switch and Switch 2 consoles, games, and accessories, redirecting purchases to the browser for checkout. It also includes gameplay history, wishlist alerts, event rewards, and news updates. With this launch, Nintendo strengthens its mobile ecosystem, joining services like Nintendo Music and Nintendo Today to create a more unified digital experience.
title: Nintendo Store App Launched for iOS, Android to Simplify eShop Shopping

description: Xiaomi 17 Ultra might launch soon, and the handset has received the 3C certification in China. The listing suggests 100W fast wired charging support on the device. This would be a significant upgrade over the existing Xiaomi 15 Ultra, which offers 90W wired fast charging. The listing suggests two variants for the phone. It is expected to be launched in the first quarter of next year.
title: Xiaomi 17 Ultra Listed on 3C Certification Website With Upgraded Charging Capabilities

description: Google Maps has rolled out 10 new India-focused features, including Gemini-powered voice assistance for hands-free navigation, local recommendations, and the ability to ask detailed questions about routes and places. The update also introduces proactive traffic alerts and accident-prone area warnings in select cities. Some features are India-exclusive, while others mark their first expansion outside the US.
title: Google Maps Gets New Features in India: Conversational Driving Experience, Proactive Traffic Alerts and More

description: iOS 26.2 is available in beta and is expected to be available before the end of the year. There is a reference to the Apple Creator Studio in the works. The iOS 26.2 beta 1 comes shortly after the release of iOS 26.1 with minor updates for iPhone models. It is also said to bring a new Enhanced Safety Alerts feature and new Liquid Glass lock screen customisations.
title: iOS 26.2 Beta 1 Reportedly Includes References to 'Apple Creator Studio'

description: Sony has released a major global update for the PlayStation Portal, introducing PS5 cloud streaming for PlayStation Plus Premium subscribers. Starting November 5 at 6pm PT (November 6, 7:30am IST), users can play PS5 titles directly from the cloud without linking to a console. The update adds a redesigned interface, 3D audio support, accessibility features, in-game purchases, and improved connectivity tools. While the Portal remains a streaming-only device, this update makes it far more independent and versatile for portable gaming.
title: Sony's PlayStation Portal Now Lets You Stream PS5 Games With a PlayStation Plus Premium Subscription

description: Maharashtra has signed a Letter of Intent with Starlink, becoming the first Indian state to formally partner with the SpaceX subsidiary for satellite-based internet services. The deployment will focus on remote districts, supporting government institutions and critical infrastructure that remain difficult to serve through fibre networks. The initiative aligns with the state’s digital inclusion push and India’s wider efforts to bridge connectivity gaps in underserved regions.
title: Maharashtra Becomes First Indian State to Partner With Elon Musk’s Starlink: 5 Things to Know
